reviewText: This is my favorite Lomi Lomi dvd.  Lots of valuable information and included a full body demo that I enjoy watching over and over again.

Thank you for the wonderful DVD!  Lomilomi is a wonderful massage, and this video shows just that.  I ordered it and received it the very next day.  It was easy to watch/follow and the information and quality of the video was just awesome.  Thank you for sharing and taking the time to do such great work with the DVD.  Hope there are more in the near future!!

I love this DVD!  It is full of clear, concise instruction and helpful tips.  It is well segmented for instruction and a full demo of LomiLomi on the front and back of the body.  Linda has a lot of energy and a real passion for LomiLomi.  The music of Karma Farm really tops it off.  If you are interested in LomiLomi, get this one.  This video will be flying off the shelves!  I have also taken Linda's CEU class and highly recommend it.  The classes are just as full of energy and passion as the DVD.  Enjoy!
